meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of liposomes.
meanings.sent1: The liposomal treatment was gentle on the skin.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed a liposomal medication for the patient.
meanings.sent3: The liposomal lotion felt like a soft cloud on my hands.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as a liposomal embrace.
meanings.sent5: The liposomal technology revolutionized drug delivery.

meanings.sent1: The liposomal solution protected the fragile molecules.
meanings.sent2: The liposomal capsules were easy to swallow.
meanings.sent3: The liposomal surprise inside the box made me giggle.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a liposomal shield against criticism.
meanings.sent5: The liposomal coating preserved the freshness of the food.
